Good morning, Living world! Those of us who are going to VivirViviendo we greet you! Dawn in the Bolivarian Alliance, our ALBA! Hugs Venezuela!
Today is August 8 ... very special day for me! Exact 40 years ago I was entering the Escuela Militar de Venezuela. And I was starting to be born again!
Hail oh, My Alma Mater, save oh, for my old Masters and my dear Companions of the Simon Bolivar Promotion! Hail for you 40 years!
And here I am, in a new Renacer, initiating a new Return, a new and long Climbing. I declare myself Cadet Hugo Chávez again!
Good morning, Ernesto! Hi Evelin! Kiss my beloved Marián! Hello my workers channel 8! Hugs to all the people!
Marián, I really congratulate you! How much time I had waiting for those books to endow our children! Bravo! So it is governed! Bravo!
Marián, you have to make a documentary of all that logistic and creative process! This is history! This is construction of Socialism! Bravo!
Marián, why do not you show some contents! Come on!
All these economic and cost data must be given and explained well. Compare Capitalism with Socialism!
Bolivarian greetings to my General PérezArcay and my Comrade Gral. GarcíaCarneiro! And to my dear Companions! Live My Military School!
